## 12.1
1)sex
```{r}
BothSexes <-
  BabyNames %>%
  spread( key=sex, value=count ) %>%
  filter( F>1, M>1 )

View(BothSexes)
```
2)
Aalijah, Aalijah, Aamari, Aarin, Aarion, Aarya, Abiola, Abir, Abrar, Aby
```{r}
BothSexes %>%
  mutate(bal=abs(log(F/M))) %>%
  group_by(name) %>%
  arrange(bal)
```
3)
Baby, Dusty, Jaylin, Justice, Lavern, Marion, Rian, Ryley, Tegan, Leslie
```{r}
BothSexes %>%
  mutate(bal=abs(log(F/M))) %>%
  arrange(bal) %>%
  filter( F>100, M >100 )
```
